channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.title: Report X-2023071019
item.description:
Report X-2023071019

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: EASTABOGA
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was sent out on route with driver. Upon going on the route and attempting delivery it was found to be leaking. Package was brought back to terminal and was then inspected. During inspection it was found that the top had came off a bottle and contents were leaking out DescribePack: The cap came off the bottle and the contents started leaking DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: When package was brought back to terminal it was in a bag and then it was put into a tote during inspection to check on where the leakage was coming from
